summary: A simple edit to Kaw\'s Cat Disguise that allows the items to be equipped with circlets and necklace.
descriptionHtml:
Please report any item slot conflicts in the comments section, still not certain about the item slot I\'m using.


This mod adds two types of ears, and a cat-tail, that can be crafted at any forge.


Next update will add a version that has the proper stats for SkyRe, though no real errors occur with this version.
The tail item equips to item slot 40, and the cloth unarmored ears equip to item slot 60.  The light and heavy armor versions equip to both slot 60 and slot 42, to prevent equipping them and an actual helmet.


For better tails I would reccomend danshive\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13995]Mystic Tails[/url] mod, as it has proper animation and more choices.

This is an edited version of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6150]Kaw\'s Cat Disguise[/url]  which allows the circlets to be worn with the ears, and necklaces to be worn with the tail.  


Anyone who wants to use this mod or resources from this mod,  feel free to!
author: Britefire - Original by Kaw

files.name: Cat Disguise Set Slot V2 - Slot 60
